title: All Ball - Lack of Pippen 'Last Dance' Context; 4 x NBA All-Star Mark Price on MJ Battles, 'The Shot,' Shooting, '84 Olympic Tryouts
itunes:title: All Ball - Lack of Pippen 'Last Dance' Context; 4 x NBA All-Star Mark Price on MJ Battles, 'The Shot,' Shooting, '84 Olympic Tryouts
description:
In this episode, Doug points out how The Last Dance Jordan documentary conveniently leaves out Scottie Pippen's role in his falling out with the Bulls, and why documentaries are always slanted to one side. His guest this week is 4-time NBA All-Star Mark Price, who discusses watching the evolution of Michael Jordan from college to the NBA, his battles with the Cavs against MJ's Bulls, the Bad Boys Pistons, and being on the receiving end of 'The Shot.' Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
